body_html:
@YuefengZhou
I'm using ubuntu 14.04 and the GPU is a K80. I ran ./configure and
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
with success

the problem was on that very last step

body:
@YuefengZhou 
I'm using ubuntu 14.04 and the GPU is a K80. I ran `./configure` and 
`bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
with success

the problem was on that very last step
